def convert_hash_to_array(hash):
    return [[k, hash[k]] for k in sorted(hash)]

def convert_hash_to_array(d):
    return [ [k,v] for k,v in sorted(d.items()) ]

def convert_hash_to_array(dct):
    return sorted(list(item) for item in dct.items())

def convert_hash_to_array(hash):
    return sorted(list(x) for x in hash.items())
convert_hash_to_array = lambda l: [[a,l[a]] for a in sorted(l)]

def convert_hash_to_array(hash):
    return sorted([[att, hash[att]] for att in hash])
